about_the_game:
Fox-style Cthulhu Mythos II! Different heroine series can be played in any preferred order without affecting your comprehension of the storyline.

◆ Featured Systems


　◇ TRPG-style life simulation game where advancing numerical values can progress the storyline and also influence the narrative.
　◇ No fixed strategy routes; Instead, you have the freedom to explore flexibly, which will lead you to various endings.
　◇ Environment settings allow for full CG mode, freely browsing HCG.

◆Story


I am Laurentia, raised and trained as a religious clergy member since childhood, and eventually became a nun. However, strangely enough, starting from adolescence, I have been having erotic dreams consistently. In reality, I have not engaged in any sexual relations with anyone, but in my dreams, I find myself involved in promiscuous and multiple partner encounters.

In reality, I remain celibate until one day when I came across a book titled "The King in Yellow" at the church. I don't know why the church would have such a book in its collection, but after reading it, I had an epiphany. The world's understanding of God is flawed, and as a clergy member, it is my duty to convey the truth to the masses.

The most effective way to convey the truth is through "sexual intercourse."
Sexual intercourse is the most primal and powerful force of humanity. Just think about how it can give birth to life; it's truly incredible.

Our sexual encounters will please the gods. As humans can create countless stories, there will be just as many varieties of sexual love there will be. Come forth! Let us immerse ourselves in the endless sex drama and fulfill the divine desires.

◆Gameplay


I have four attribute values: Acting, Aesthetics, Mysticism, and Leadership. These four values can help me progress and achieve my goals. When corresponding events occur, the results will be determined through dice rolls.

In terms of value management, I have Stamina, Mana, SAN, and Sexual Drama.

Stamina is required for any activity, while Mana allows me to do things beyond what ordinary people can do. I've heard that when the SAN value reach zero, one goes insane, but I won't go insane because it is the world that is insane. The world's understanding of God is incorrect. The most special is the sexual drama points. I must continuously please my own divinity and satiate the desires towards the divine within myself. I have no idea what would happen if the divine is left unsatisfied.

◆ Guest Actors


Without a doubt, I am the protagonist of the Endless Sex Drama. However, However, but having only myself in this feels too lonely. Allow me to introduce a few guest actors to you.

Beryl


She always looks at me with lustful eyes. It is said that she used to be a pervert.
Heh, I want to see what tricks she can pull off as a transformed girl.

Siena


The head maid of Black Feather café, appearing innocent and harmless on the outside.
However, years of holy training have taught me to be cautious around her.

Erotic Nun


Who is she...?

◆ Features


◇ 30 CG images, including 6 exquisite SPINE: H animations. Other HCG images also have simple frame animation or vibration effects, aiming to enhance the utility of this work, with a total of over 1000 variations.

◇ Depending on different adult scenes, there will be interactive options to address the issue of viewing adult scenes in similar works like watching slides.

◇ The game text comprises a vast and immersive content, consisting of 100,000 words that offer a rich and captivating experience.

◇ The protagonist has seven sets of clothing to change into: nun's attire, casual wear, cheongsam, bikini, opera costume, kimono, maid outfit, or simply being naked.

◇ A story about a nun spreading the teachings and exploring the enigmatic "King in Yellow" of the Cthulhu mythos.

◇ Game endings: True Ending x1, Good Ending x1, Normal Ending x1, and several epilogues reflecting the player's gameplay choices, avoiding the monotony of similar games where specific values only lead to one ending.

◇ Experience an immersive TRPG-style adventure that offers a captivating experience, whether you choose to play as the protagonist or simply observe. It delivers a satisfying and engaging experience for all participants.

◆Author's Introduction


Foxsister, a pioneer of TRPG (Tabletop Role-Playing Game) promotion in early Taiwan, formerly taught at a university. However, bewitched by the allure of adult themes, she now channels her fervor into the creation of tantalizing games, forsaking the confines of teaching.

This work was created in response to fan requests. By completing the true ending, players can have intimate moments with the author.

Note: The explicit CGs from the author are gifts for the players who enjoy my game, and they are not counted towards the total number of CGs in the game. Please enjoy them with pleasure.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual acts,  General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: King in Yellow: Endless Sex Drama

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The best way to please the gods is through sexual intercourse! Fellow believers, join me, Laurentia, in immersing ourselves in the sex drama. With stranger development, multiple partners, golden showers, cheongsams, kimonos... everything is for the divinity in our hearts.
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
